scripts.start:migrate: prisma migrate deploy && npm run start

utils: Encryption utilities encrypt and decrypt payloads using DATA_ENCRYPTION_KEY.
Generic utility helpers (strings, passwords, OTP, validation) behave deterministically under controlled randomness.
JWT utilities sign and verify access/refresh tokens with provided secrets.
Response helpers log payloads and format JSON responses when dependencies succeed or fail.
Rate limiter middleware enforces request windows and handles Redis errors gracefully.
S3 helpers validate inputs, upload/delete objects, and surface MinIO configuration errors.
SMTP helper builds transporter configuration and propagates send failures.
Token store persists, loads, and deletes tokens using Redis.
